item.title: Launch of Deputies Dataset 2002-2026
item.description: The PoliCICS laboratory is pleased to announce the launch of the Deputies Dataset 2002-2026, a new public resource developed by researcher Jorge FÃ¡brega. This dataset provides systematic estimates of the ideological positions of all members of the Chilean Chamber of Deputies across six consecutive legislative periods. The estimates are based exclusively on roll-call votes related to bill proposals debated and voted on in plenary sessions, offering a robust tool for legislative analysis.
